title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress – Plaxico opens up about the darkest moment of his career, GUEST: Andre Ferguson!
itunes:title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress – Plaxico opens up about the darkest moment of his career, GUEST: Andre Ferguson!
description:
LaVar Arrington, Plaxico Burress and T.J. Houshmandzadeh try to fix Carson Wentz’s career and discuss where the former MVP candidate will play next. The guys talk about a tragic situation that cost the life of Utah star running back Ty Jordan and Plaxico opens up about the consequences he dealt with from a very similar situation. Plus, 15x IFBB Pro Champ Andre Ferguson stops by! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
